caption:
Happy Valentine's Day! ​

What's better than sharing a table full of pasta with the people you love? Whether you're hosting friends, gathering with family, or sharing a cozy meal with someone special, let our heart-shaped pasta* take centre stage for a celebration full of love, laughter and delicious food. ​
​
How are you spending your day? Drop a comment and share your Valentine's plans with us! ​
​
#ValentinesDay #ShapesOfLove #Barilla ​
​
*Available in selected stores only. Check your local Barilla page for more info.
